name: Amau Kisumi lookalike Lora
description:
This is my first upload of a Lora I trained after getting into SD and subsequently Lora training. So I am pretty new at this. Feedbacks welcome.

Some details on the Lora settings:

Trained with around 137 photos of Amau Kisumi, a popular Japanese idol. Photos are all publicly available on her Twitter site, please support and follow her -> https://twitter.com/amau_kisumi

Kohya Trainer

  • Base Model: chilloutmix

  • Network dim/alpha: 32/16

  • learning_rate: 1e-4

  • text_encoder_lr: 5e-5

  • lr_scheduler: constant

  • train_batch: 6

  • num_epochs: 15 (but I took epochs #12 after several testing)

  • steps: 15

Most of the parameters I just follow by reading a combination of a few guides. If you have any wisdom to share, please do.

To use please:

<lora:amaukisumi-v4:0.8> or <lora:amaukisumi-v4:1> amaukisumi

I found best results between 0.8 and 1.0, works best with chilloutmix.

But due to most of her photos being gravure, you may supress NSFW by putting in Negative prompts like "lingerie, nude, naked", and specify clothes style in Positive Prompts.

Also her chest might be a bit on big side, so put like (small perfectly shaped breast)

meta.prompt:
<lora:amaukisumi-000012:0.8>
(8k, RAW photo, best quality, masterpiece:1.2), (realistic, photo-realistic:1.37), (highly detailed:1.2), detailed skin texture, (sharp clear photo images:1.2)
amaukisumi, 1girl, waist up view, selfie, cute girlfriend looks
meta.negativePrompt:
(easynegative), (ng_deepnegative_v1_75t), (blurry:2), (worst quality:2), (low quality:2), (normal quality:2), lowres, ((monochrome)),((grayscale)), paintings, sketches, blur image, mirrored image
skin spots, acnes, skin blemishes, age spot,
disfigured, bad anatomy, extra legs, extra fingers, extra arms, ugly, missing fingers, extra digit, fewer digits, bad feet, (cropped), poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn face, abdominal stretch, long neck, cross-eyed,
back view, ahegao, (tattoo), watermark, muscular, old, aged

(8k, RAW photo, best quality, masterpiece:1.2), (realistic, photo-realistic:1.37), (highly detailed:1.2), (sharp clear photo images:1.2), finely detail, highly detail, detailed skin texture, highres, professional lighting, photon mapping, radiosity, 
detailed fingers, extremely detailed eyes and face, beautiful detailed nose,
amaukisumi, casual light summer tops, dainty skirt, cute handbag, casual heels, cleavage exposed, sweaty cleavage
in al fresco cafe, detailed cafe interior, plates cups, condiments, detailed street background, shady
(slim curvy asian body), sweaty looks, shy smile, shy posture
